page.title: 20Biography (3)
page.content: The{vet's}day starts at{8.30 a.m,}he holds{surgery}from this time until {lunch,}after which he visits clients. His jobs include dealing with {household pets,}for which he has had to deal with most illnesses and diseases. He also has many dealings with{farm animals}and many{horses}and {ponies.}There has not been an{epidemic in this area since the late 1960s. He is on call for 24 hours a day and usually gets called out for {emergencies}4 to 10 times a week. His busiest months are between{October}and {April.}His{leisure}time is spent gardening, playing cricket and he is involved with a number of dog clubs. He loves the countryside in this area and the close community spirit which is found here.
